SEARCH
Package view

Class AppointmentView

java.lang.Object
view.AppointmentView
public class AppointmentView extends Object
Provides methods for displaying appointment-related information. Includes methods to view scheduled appointments, appointment outcomes, and handle user input for appointments.
Since:
2024-11-18
Version:
1.0
Author:
Hoo Jing Huan, Lim Wee Keat, Tan Wen Rong

    • promptForAppointment

      public static Appointment promptForAppointment(ArrayList<Appointment> appointments, boolean noConfirmed, Scanner scanner)
      Prompts the user to select an appointment by entering an appointment ID. Handles input and validation of the appointment ID.
      Parameters:
      appointments - The list of appointments to choose from
      noConfirmed - Whether to include confirmed appointments in the selection
      scanner - The Scanner instance for user input
      Returns:
      The selected appointment, or null if the user exits

    • getChoice

      public static int getChoice(Scanner scanner)
      Prompts the user to enter a choice. Handles validation of the input to ensure it is a number.
      Parameters:
      scanner - The Scanner instance for user input
      Returns:
      The user's choice as an integer

    • inputPrescription

      public static String inputPrescription(Scanner scanner)

      Parameters:
      scanner - The Scanner instance for user input
      Returns:
      The name of the prescribed medicine
